files.patch:
@@ -441,4 +441,9 @@ - *

If {@code name} denotes an array class, i.e. the name consists of - * one or more {@code '['} followed by the binary name of the element type - * and {@code ';'}, the element type of the array class is loaded but - * not initialized. + *

If {@code name} denotes an array class whose element type + * is a class or interface, i.e. the name consists of one or more {@code '['} + * followed by the binary name of the element type and {@code ';'} + * the element type of the array class is loaded but not initialized. + * + *

To find an array class of a primitive type, the name string + * consists of one or more {@code '['} followed by the field type descriptor + * of the primitive type (JVMS {@jvms 4.3.2 }) e.g. {@code "[I"} to + * represent an array of {@code int}.
